name: CRAZY BIGHEADS
description: CRAZY BIGHEADS is a multiplayer party game which features a bunch of crazy characters fighting over 15 minigames. You can play online with your friends, have a good time and unlock new characters at the same time!
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 - 64 bit Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated GPU Recommended Storage: 8 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
